page.title: 09 Greengrocery Shop
page.content: Mr and Mrs Stockwell's greengrocery shop is a small family business in the traditional style with an open front. We can talk to the shopkeeper from out in the street. The Stockwells have run the shop for 38 years and both of them love the life. Mr Stockwell told us that if he hadn't been a shopkeeper he would have liked to work with young people. In a way, he already does, because he spends part of the day as road crossing patrol, seeing us safely across the street on our way to and from school. Every day he has fresh stock delivered. He sells some groceries, as well as fruit and vegetables. Most people buy potatoes there, but he also stocks asparagus for those who want something special.
